io.confluent.ksql.function.udtf

Annotation Type UdtfDescription


  • @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Target(value=TYPE)
public @interface UdtfDescription
    Classes with this annotation will be scanned for the @Udtf annotation. This tells KSQL that this class contains methods that you would like to add as table functions to KSQL. The name of the function will be the same for each of the @Udtf annotated methods in your class. The parameters and return types can vary.

    • Required Element Summary

      Required Elements 
      Modifier and Type Required Element and Description
      java.lang.String description
      A description of the table function.
      java.lang.String name
      The name of the table function.

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      java.lang.String author
      The author of the table function.
      java.lang.String category
      The category or type of the table function.
      java.lang.String version
      The version of the table function.

    • Element Detail

      • name

        public abstract java.lang.String name
        The name of the table function.

        This is the identifier users will use to invoke this table function. The function name must be unique.

        Returns:
        function name.

      • description

        public abstract java.lang.String description
        A description of the table function.

        This text is displayed when the user calls DESCRIBE FUNCTION ....

        If there are multiple overloads of the function implementation, individual overloads can chose to return specific descriptions via Udf.description(). In which case, both this general description and the overload specific descriptions will be displayed to the user.

        Returns:
        function description.

      • category

        public abstract java.lang.String category
        The category or type of the table function.

        This text is used to group functions displayed when invoking SHOW FUNCTIONS ....

        Returns:
        function category.
        Default:
        "TABLE"

      • author

        public abstract java.lang.String author
        The author of the table function.

        This text is displayed when the user calls DESCRIBE FUNCTION ....

        Returns:
        function author.
        Default:
        ""

      • version

        public abstract java.lang.String version
        The version of the table function.

        This text is displayed when the user calls DESCRIBE FUNCTION ....

        Returns:
        function version.
        Default:
        ""
